title: I am writing a horror novel. The first chapter is based on a first person’s point of view. Can I write the second chapter based on the same person's third person point of views? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey. First of all, an applaud and my good wishes to you on your endeavor. Now, coming to your answer. Ofcourse you can! It will help the reader in understanding your plot even better and will give them a clearer picture of the story. Go for it😊

Obviously you can but make sure that format of the text clearly points the shift in narration. At the end of the day whatever you write it should be in a way that is comprehendible to the reader as you intended.
